attributes.action: Legislate to reduce CO2 emissions by at least 3% each year, overseen by an independent body.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Climate change is not just the biggest single issue we face today, it is the biggest single threat we have ever faced. Can we really continue to smile into the innocent faces of our grandchildren and do virtually nothing.

A 3% reduction each year is easily achievable, and does not necessitate a rise in overall taxation.
